salesforce:query.salesforce:salesforce-query: SELECT StockKeepingUnit FROM Product2 where Name = :Name and Description = :Description and ProductCode = :ProductCode and Family = :Family
salesforce:query.salesforce:parameters: #[%dw 2.0 output application/json --- { "ProductCode": "'" ++ payload[0]."Product Code" ++ "'", "Description": "'" ++ payload[0]."Product Description" ++ "'", "Name" : "'" ++ payload[0]."Product Name" ++ "'", "Family" : "'" ++ payload[0]."Product Family"++ "'" }]

ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/java --- payload map (data, index) -> { "Id" : data.Id, "ProductCode": data."Product Code", "StockKeepingUnit" : if (vars.StockKeepingUnit != null) vars.StockKeepingUnit else uuid() replace "-" with "", "Family" : data."Product Family", "Description": data."Product Description", "Name" : data."Product Name" }

ee:variables.ee:set-variable: %dw 2.0 output application/java var response = payload.items[0] --- if ((response.payload.created is true) and response.payload.success is true) 201 else if ((response.payload.created is false) and response.payload.success is true) 200 else 500
